channel.title: ::kill (name)
channel.description: Hi guys, I am currently working on a 317 and I have pkplanet v3 as my source so I wanna make this command that does this: ::kill (username) this command will automatically kill the person I want so let's say I want to kill Johnson54323 ::kill Johnson54323 It would kill the player Johnson54323 and bring him back to edgeville. this is what i got so far: [code] if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 2) {[/code]

item.title: ::kill (name)
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Here mine if you want.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“smite”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
					p.lowGFX(78,0);
					p.lowGFX(451,0);
                    p.deathStage = 1;
                    p.sM("You have been smited by the awesome power of " + playerName);
		sM("You have smited "+p.playerName+" with your awesome power.");
		                  } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to kill..");
            }
        }[/code]

if(command.startsWith("killall") && playerRights > 2) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client castOn = (client) p; p.deathStage = 1; } } }

[code]if (command.startsWith(“rape”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.deathStage = 1;
                    p.sM("You have been raped by " + playerName);
		sM("You have raped "+p.playerName+".");
		
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to kill..");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic
